mapper.sql: cpns_id, cpns_name, issue_type, company_id, store_id, pmt_id, cpns_prefix, cpns_gen_quantity, cpns_key, cpns_status, cpns_point, rule_id, cpns_type, online_gen_quantity, online_limit, online_quantity, create_time, disabled,big_pic
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from t_coupons
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_coupons (cpns_id, cpns_name, issue_type, company_id, store_id, pmt_id, cpns_prefix, cpns_gen_quantity, cpns_key, cpns_status, cpns_point, rule_id, cpns_type, online_gen_quantity, online_limit, online_quantity, create_time, disabled,big_pic ) values (#{cpnsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpnsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pmtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpnsPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpnsGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpnsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpnsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpnsPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpnsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onlineLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onlineQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update t_coupons
cpns_id = #{record.cpnsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cpns_name = #{record.cpnsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issue_type = #{record.issueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
store_id = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pmt_id = #{record.pmtId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cpns_prefix = #{record.cpnsPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpns_gen_quantity = #{record.cpnsGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cpns_key = #{record.cpnsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpns_status = #{record.cpnsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpns_point = #{record.cpnsPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rule_id = #{record.ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

big_pic = #{record.bigPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_coupons set cpns_id = #{record.cpnsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpns_name = #{record.cpnsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issue_type = #{record.issueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_id = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pmt_id = #{record.pmtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpns_prefix = #{record.cpnsPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpns_gen_quantity = #{record.cpnsGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpns_key = #{record.cpnsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpns_status = #{record.cpnsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpns_point = #{record.cpnsPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rule_id = #{record.ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpns_type = #{record.cpnsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_gen_quantity = #{record.onlineGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_limit = #{record.onlineLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_quantity = #{record.onlineQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, disabled = #{record.disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, big_pic = #{record.bigPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_coupons set cpns_name = #{cpnsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issue_type = #{issueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pmt_id = #{pmtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpns_prefix = #{cpnsPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpns_gen_quantity = #{cpnsGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpns_key = #{cpnsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpns_status = #{cpnsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpns_point = #{cpnsPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpns_type = #{cpnsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_gen_quantity = #{onlineGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_limit = #{onlineLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_quantity = #{onlineQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, big_pic = #{bigPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cpns_id = #{cpnsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.company_id,t.store_id,t.big_pic, cpns_id, cpns_name, issue_type, cpns_prefix, cpns_gen_quantity, cpns_status, cpns_point, t.rule_id, cpns_type, online_limit, online_quantity, from_time, to_time, member_lv_ids, status, stop_rules_processing, sort_order, c_template, s_template, t.type, description,s.conditions,s.action_solution,t.cnns_par,t.cnns_price,t.online_gen_quantity from t_coupons t left join t_sales_rule_goods s on t.rule_id = s.rule_id where cpns_id= #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update t_coupons
cpns_name = #{cpnsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issue_type = #{issueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

cpns_gen_quantity = #{cpnsGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cpns_key = #{cpnsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpns_status = #{cpnsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpns_point = #{cpnsPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cpns_type = #{cpnsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_gen_quantity = #{onlineGenQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
online_limit = #{onlineLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
online_quantity = #{onlineQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
big_pic = #{bigPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cnns_price = #{cnnsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cnns_par = #{cnnsPar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where cpns_id = #{cpnsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_coupons set disabled = '1' where cpns_id = #{cpnsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
